text: The 1960 Volta a Catalunya was the 40th edition of the Volta a Catalunya cycle race and was held from 4 September to 11 September 1960. The race started in Montjuïc and finished in Barcelona. The race was won by Miguel Poblet. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 56" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 5' 03" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 5' 50" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 6' 29" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 6' 52" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 7' 09" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 8' 12" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 8' 33" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 8' 59" |} |} ==References== 1960 Volta Category:1960 in Spanish road cycling Category:September 1960 sports events
